eForms.BT-1252: Identifierare: Tidigare upphandling som motiverar direkttilldelning
eForms.BT-1252_tooltip: En identifierare av ett tidigare förfarande som motiverar användningen av ett förfarande som möjliggör direkttilldelning av kontrakt, dvs. som motiverar ett förfarande som inte kräver offentliggörande av en anbudsinfordran i Europeiska unionens officiella tidning.
eForms.BT-135_tooltip: Motivering för att använda ett förfarande som möjliggör direkttilldelning av kontrakt, dvs. ett förfarande som inte kräver offentliggörande av en anbudsinfordran i Europeiska unionens officiella tidning.
eForms.BT-53_tooltip: Köparen förbehåller sig rätten (som inte är en skyldighet) att göra ytterligare inköp från entreprenören (under kontraktets giltighetstid).
eForms.BT-5101_tooltip: Namnet på den gata, väg, aveny osv. där leveransplatsen är belägen och ytterligare identifikation (t.ex. husnummer).
eForms.BT-5131_tooltip: Namnet på den ort (stad eller by) där leveransplatsen är belägen.
eForms.BT-5071_tooltip: Platsen i enlighet med den gemensamma nomenklaturen för statistiska territoriella enheter (Nuts). Nuts 3-nomenklaturkoden ska användas.
eForms.BT-5141_tooltip: Det land som leveransplatsen är belägen i.
eForms.BT-727_tooltip: Det finns andra begränsningar för leveransplatsen (t.ex. ”var som helst inom Europeiska ekonomiska samarbetsområdet”, ”var som helst i ett visst land”).
eForms.BT-60_tooltip: Upphandlingen finansieras åtminstone delvis av unionsmedel, såsom de europeiska struktur- och investeringsfonderna eller bidrag från unionen.
eForms.BT-7220_tooltip: Programmet för de unionsmedel som används för att åtminstone delvis finansiera kontraktet.
eForms.BT-5010_tooltip: Identifierare för det unionsprogram som används för att åtminstone delvis finansiera kontraktet. Informationen ska vara så konkret som möjligt (t.ex. stödavtalets nummer, nationell identifierare, projektakronym, kontraktets nummer).
eForms.BT-6140_tooltip: Ytterligare uppgifter om det unionsprogram eller unionsprojekt som används för att åtminstone delvis finansiera upphandlingen.
eForms.BT-120_tooltip: Köparen förbehåller sig rätten att tilldela kontraktet på grundval av de ursprungliga anbuden utan ytterligare förhandlingar.
eForms.BT-722_tooltip: Programmet för de unionsmedel som används för att åtminstone delvis finansiera kontraktet.
eForms.BT-5011_official: Identifierare: Finansiering med EU-medel för kontrakt
eForms.BT-5011: Identifierare: Finansiering med EU-medel för kontrakt
eForms.BT-5011_tooltip: Identifierare för det unionsprogram som används för att åtminstone delvis finansiera kontraktet. Informationen ska vara så konkret som möjligt (t.ex. stödavtalets nummer, nationell identifierare, projektakronym, kontraktets nummer).
eForms.BT-6110_official: Ytterligare uppgifter om EU-medel för kontrakt
eForms.BT-6110: Ytterligare uppgifter om EU-medel för kontrakt
eForms.BT-6110_tooltip: Ytterligare uppgifter om det unionsprogram eller unionsprojekt som används för att åtminstone delvis finansiera upphandlingen.
eForms.BT-27_tooltip: Det beräknade värdet för upphandlingsförfarandet eller delkontraktet under hela dess varaktighet, inklusive optioner och förlängningar.
eForms.BT-24-Procedure_tooltip: Beskrivning av kännetecknen för och mängden av det som köps eller av de behov och krav som ska uppfyllas i detta förfarande eller delkontrakt. Vid meddelande om ändring ska en beskrivning ges av upphandlingen före och efter ändringen.
eForms.BT-271_tooltip: Det högsta värdet av ramavtalet för upphandlingsförfarandet eller delkontraktet under hela dess varaktighet, inklusive optioner och förlängningar. Värdet täcker alla de kontrakt som ska tilldelas inom ramavtalet.
eForms.BT-26_tooltip: Typ av klassificering som beskriver köpet (t.ex. CPV-koder).
eForms.BT-262_tooltip: Koden från den klassificering som bäst beskriver köpet.
eForms.BT-263_tooltip: En ytterligare kod från den klassificering som också beskriver köpet.
eForms.BT-15_tooltip: Den webbadress som ger åtkomst till (den icke-begränsade delen av) upphandlingsdokumenten. För alla meddelanden med undantag för förhandsmeddelanden ska webbadressen ge direkt åtkomst (dvs. den webbsida där dokumenten finns, inte en allmän webbplats), utan begränsningar (t.ex. ingen registrering) och fullständig (dvs. upphandlingsdokumenten ska vara fullständiga) och kostnadsfri åtkomst, och dokumenten ska finnas tillgängliga redan vid den tidpunkt då meddelandet offentliggörs.
eForms.BT-708_tooltip: Det eller de språk som dessa upphandlingsdokument är officiellt tillgängliga på. Dessa språkversioner har samma rättsliga giltighet.
eForms.BT-737_tooltip: Det eller de språk som dessa upphandlingsdokument (eller delar av dem) är inofficiellt tillgängliga på. Dessa språkversioner är inte officiella översättningar, utan tillhandahålls endast för kännedom.
eForms.BT-14_tooltip: Åtkomsten till vissa upphandlingsdokument är begränsad.
eForms.BT-707_official: Motivering för begränsad tillgång till dokument
eForms.BT-707: Motivering för begränsad tillgång till dokument
eForms.BT-707_tooltip: Motiveringen för att begränsa åtkomsten till vissa upphandlingsdokument.
eForms.BT-615_tooltip: Den webbadress där det finns information om åtkomsten till de begränsade upphandlingsdokumenten (eller den begränsade delen av dem).
eForms.BT-119_tooltip: Det dynamiska inköpssystemet har avvecklats. Inga ytterligare kontrakt kommer att tilldelas i det dynamiska inköpssystemet, förutom dem som offentliggörs i detta meddelande. Detta fält kan användas även om inga kontrakt tilldelas i meddelandet om tilldelning av kontrakt.
eForms.BT-709_official: Nytt beräknat högsta värde för ett ramavtal
eForms.BT-709: Nytt beräknat högsta värde för ett ramavtal
eForms.BT-709_tooltip: Det högsta värde som kan användas inom ramavtalet under hela dess varaktighet, inklusive optioner och förlängningar, beräknat på grundval av vinnarens eller vinnarnas anbud.
eForms.BT-660_official: Nytt beräknat värde för ett ramavtal
eForms.BT-660: Nytt beräknat värde för ett ramavtal
eForms.BT-660_tooltip: Det värde som troligen kommer att användas inom ramavtalet under hela dess varaktighet, inklusive optioner och förlängningar, beräknat på nytt på grundval av vinnarens eller vinnarnas anbud.
eForms.BT-759_tooltip: Det antal anbud, anbudsansökningar och intresseanmälningar som inkommit. Anbud, inklusive alternativa anbud eller flera anbud som lämnas in (för ett delkontrakt) av samma anbudsgivare, ska räknas som ett enda anbud.
eForms.BT-760_tooltip: Den typ av inlämningar som inkommit (anbud, anbudsansökningar och intresseanmälningar). Det totala antal inlämningar som mottagits ska anges. Om ett meddelande inte omfattas av direktiv 2009/81/EG och inte avser sociala tjänster eller andra särskilda tjänster, ska det antal anbud som mottagits från mikroföretag samt små och medelstora företag, det antal anbud som mottagits från anbudsgivare som är registrerade i andra EES-länder och det antal anbud som mottagits från anbudsgivare som är registrerade i länder utanför EES också anges. Alla anbud ska räknas, oavsett om de är godtagbara eller icke-godtagbara. För anbud som lämnas av en grupp av anbudsgivare (t.ex. ett konsortium) ska anbudet räknas in i den relevanta kategorin (t.ex. små och medelstora företag) om merparten av arbetet förväntas utföras av anbudsgivare som ingår i denna kategori (t.ex. om de är små och medelstora företag).
eForms.BT-710_tooltip: Värdet för anbudet med det lägsta värdet, som också var godtagbart. Ett anbud ska anses godtagbart om det har lämnats av en anbudsgivare som inte har uteslutits och som uppfyller urvalskriterierna och om det överensstämmer med de tekniska specifikationerna utan att vara ogiltigt (t.ex. det har mottagits för sent, det har onormalt låga priser eller kostnader) eller icke-godtagbart eller olämpligt. Endast anbud för vilka det har kontrollerats huruvida de är godtagbara får beaktas.
eForms.BT-711_tooltip: Värdet för anbudet med det högsta värdet, som också var godtagbart. Ett anbud ska anses godtagbart om det har lämnats av en anbudsgivare som inte har uteslutits och som uppfyller urvalskriterierna och om det överensstämmer med de tekniska specifikationerna utan att vara ogiltigt (t.ex. det har mottagits för sent, det har onormalt låga priser eller kostnader) eller icke-godtagbart eller olämpligt. Endast anbud för vilka det har kontrollerats huruvida de är godtagbara får beaktas.
eForms.BT-720_tooltip: Anbudets värde eller något annat resultat, inklusive optioner och förlängningar. Om det rör sig om meddelanden om ändring anges värdet för ändringen.
eForms.BT-1711_tooltip: Anbudet rangordnades (detta avser inte själva placeringen, utan anger endast att rangordning ägde rum).
eForms.BT-171_tooltip: Anbudets placering (dvs. om anbudet kom på första, andra eller tredje plats osv.) i en projekttävling, ett ramavtal med flera vinnare (t.ex. kaskader), ett innovationspartnerskap, en konkurrenspräglad dialog eller något annat förfarande.
eForms.BT-773_tooltip: Här anges om åtminstone en del av kontraktet kommer att läggas ut på underentreprenad.
eForms.BT-730_tooltip: Köparen känner åtminstone till det beräknade värdet av den del av kontraktet som entreprenören kommer att lägga ut på underentreprenad till tredje part.
eForms.BT-553_tooltip: Det beräknade värdet av den del av kontraktet som entreprenören kommer att lägga ut på underentreprenad till tredje part.
eForms.BT-731_tooltip: Köparen känner åtminstone till den beräknade andel av kontraktet som entreprenören kommer att lägga ut på underentreprenad till tredje part jämfört med hela kontraktet.
eForms.BT-555_tooltip: Den beräknade andel av kontraktet som entreprenören kommer att lägga ut på underentreprenad till tredje part jämfört med hela kontraktet.
eForms.BT-554_tooltip: Beskrivning av den del av kontraktet som entreprenören kommer att lägga ut på underentreprenad till tredje part.
eForms.BT-145_tooltip: Den dag då kontraktet ingicks. Detta är normalt det datum då den sista avtalsparten undertecknade kontraktet. Om inget kontrakt undertecknas kan detta datum dock motsvara andra datum (t.ex. det datum då köparen underrättade den vinnande anbudsgivaren). Datumet för ingåendet av kontrakt infaller alltid senare än utgången av den period under vilken kontrakt inte får ingås och när allt underlag som lämnats in av vinnaren har kontrollerats.
eForms.BT-3202_tooltip: En identifierare för det vinnande anbudet eller ett annat resultat som ledde till detta kontrakt.
eForms.BT-22_tooltip: Den interna identifierare som används för filer avseende upphandlingsförfarandet eller delkontraktet innan en identifierare för hela upphandlingen har erhållits (t.ex. en identifierare från köparens dokumenthanteringssystem eller upphandlingssystem).
eForms.BT-150_tooltip: En identifierare för kontraktet eller, om det rör sig om meddelanden om frivillig förhandsinsyn och meddelanden om resultat av projekttävlingen, för beslutet. Informationen i avsnittet om kontrakt avser detta kontrakt eller detta beslut.
eForms.BT-721_tooltip: Namnet på kontraktet eller, om det rör sig om meddelanden om frivillig förhandsinsyn och meddelanden om resultat av projekttävlingen, på beslutet.
eForms.BT-141_tooltip: Beskrivning av ändringar i meddelandet jämfört med det ursprungliga meddelandet.
eForms.BT-719_tooltip: Datum och tidpunkt då upphandlingsdokumenten ändrades.
eForms.BT-140_tooltip: Huvudskälet till ändringen i meddelandet jämfört med det ursprungliga meddelandet.
eForms.BT-762_tooltip: Beskrivning av huvudskälet till ändringen i meddelandet jämfört med det ursprungliga meddelandet.
eForms.BT-330_tooltip: Identifieraren för en grupp av delkontrakt i upphandlingen.
eForms.BT-1375_official: Identifierare: delkontrakt som ingår i gruppen
eForms.BT-1375: Identifierare: delkontrakt som ingår i gruppen
eForms.BT-1375_tooltip: En identifierare för ett delkontrakt inom förfarandet som ingår i en grupp av delkontrakt för vilka ett anbud kan lämnas och utvärderas.
eForms.BT-13716_official: Identifierare: Avsnitt i tidigare meddelande som ändras
eForms.BT-13716: Identifierare: Avsnitt i tidigare meddelande som ändras
eForms.BT-13716_tooltip: En identifierare för ett eller flera avsnitt i det ändrade meddelandet. Informationen i avsnittet om ändring avser detta eller dessa avsnitt.
eForms.BT-758_official: Identifierare: Version av meddelandet som ändras
eForms.BT-758: Identifierare: Version av meddelandet som ändras
eForms.BT-758_tooltip: Hänvisningen till den version av det föregående meddelandet som ska ändras. Detta bidrar till att exempelvis hålla reda på versioner av meddelanden eller ändringar av meddelanden före offentliggörandet.
eForms.BT-03_tooltip: Typ av formulär i enlighet med upphandlingslagstiftningen.
eForms.BT-02_tooltip: Typ av meddelande i enlighet med upphandlingslagstiftningen.
eForms.BT-738_tooltip: Det önskade datumet för offentliggörande av meddelandet i TED (t.ex. för att undvika offentliggörande på en nationell helgdag).
eForms.BT-739_tooltip: Faxnumret för att kontakta organisationen. För att undvika onödig behandling av personuppgifter är identifiering av en fysisk person med hjälp av ett faxnummer endast tillåten om det är nödvändigt (i den mening som avses i förordning (EU) 2016/679 och förordning (EU) 2018/1725).
eForms.BT-509_tooltip: Organisationens webbadress (URL) för utbyte av data och dokument.
eForms.BT-508_tooltip: Den webbplats där köparen offentliggör information om upphandlingsförfaranden (t.ex. meddelanden, upphandlingsdokument).
eForms.BT-706_tooltip: Nationalitet(er) för vinnarens, anbudsgivarens eller underentreprenörens verkliga huvudman som offentliggjorts i det eller de register som upprättats i enlighet med Europaparlamentets och rådets direktiv (EU) 2018/843. Om ett sådant register inte finns (t.ex. om det rör sig om entreprenörer som är etablerade utanför unionen) ska motsvarande information anges från andra källor.
eForms.BT-746_tooltip: Nationaliteten (eller nationaliteterna) för vinnarens, anbudsgivarens eller underentreprenörens verkliga huvudman offentliggörs inte i det eller de register som upprättats i enlighet med direktiv (EU) 2018/843, eftersom vinnaren är noterad på en reglerad marknad (t.ex. en värdepappersbörs) som garanterar tillräcklig insyn i enlighet med lagstiftningen om bekämpning av penningtvätt.
eForms.BT-625_tooltip: Den enhet som varan, tjänsten eller byggentreprenaderna levereras i, t.ex. timmar eller kilogram. Om CPV-koden anger ett varuinköp som inte behöver någon ytterligare enhet (t.ex. bilar), ska ingen enhet anges och mängden ses som ett antal, t.ex. ”antal bilar”.
eForms.BT-111_tooltip: Alla ytterligare kategorier av köpare som deltar i ramavtalet och som inte nämns vid namn (t.ex. ”alla sjukhus i regionen Toscana”).
eForms.BT-632_tooltip: Namnet på det elektroniska verktyg eller den elektroniska enhet som används för elektronisk kommunikation.
eForms.BT-744_tooltip: Avancerad eller kvalificerad elektronisk underskrift eller stämpel (enligt definitionen i Europaparlamentets och rådets förordning (EU) nr 910/2014) krävs.
eForms.BT-134_tooltip: Kompletterande information om det offentliga öppnandet av anbud. (T.ex. vem som får delta i öppnandet och om det krävs något tillstånd.)
eForms.BT-771_official: Sen inlämning av information om anbudsgivare
eForms.BT-771: Sen inlämning av information om anbudsgivare
eForms.BT-771_tooltip: Här anges om information om anbudsgivare kan kompletteras, även efter det att inlämningsfristen har löpt ut.
eForms.BT-772_official: Beskrivning av sen inlämning av information om anbudsgivare
eForms.BT-772: Beskrivning av sen inlämning av information om anbudsgivare
eForms.BT-772_tooltip: Beskrivning av den information om anbudsgivare som kan kompletteras, även efter det att inlämningsfristen har löpt ut.
eForms.BT-712_tooltip: Antal organisationer som har begärt att köparen ska pröva sina beslut (t.ex. tekniska specifikationer, beslut om tilldelning).
eForms.BT-635_official: Antal ansökningar om prövning hos köparen
eForms.BT-635: Antal ansökningar om prövning hos köparen
eForms.BT-635_tooltip: Antalet ansökningar som köparen tagit emot om prövning av sina beslut.
eForms.BT-636_official: Ansökningar om prövning hos köparen – oriktighetstyp
eForms.BT-636: Ansökningar om prövning hos köparen – oriktighetstyp
eForms.BT-636_tooltip: Den typ av oriktighet som görs gällande i ansökningarna om prövning.
eForms.BT-756_tooltip: Förhandsmeddelande som används som anbudsinfordran (eller ett särskilt delkontrakt) avslutas. Inga ytterligare kontrakt, förutom dem som offentliggörs i detta meddelande, kommer att tilldelas efter detta förhandsmeddelande som används som anbudsinfordran. Detta fält kan användas även om inga kontrakt tilldelas i meddelandet om tilldelning av kontrakt.
eForms.BT-195_tooltip: Identifierare av ett fält som inte ska publiceras omedelbart. Endast fält som gäller värdena ”Resultat” och grupper av fält som gäller ”Anbud” och ”Resultat per delkontrakt” får förbli opublicerade. När det gäller Europaparlamentets och rådets direktiv 2014/25/EU får även tilldelningskriterierna, upphandlingsförfarandet, vissa datum och i vissa fall information om kännetecknen för och mängden av en tjänst förbli opublicerade.
eForms.BT-197_tooltip: Motivering till varför ett fält inte omedelbart ska publiceras.
eForms.BT-196_official: Beskrivning av skälet till uppskjuten publicering
eForms.BT-196: Beskrivning av skälet till uppskjuten publicering
eForms.BT-196_tooltip: Motivering till varför ett fält inte omedelbart publiceras och till varför det har valts ett senare datum då det kan publiceras.
eForms.BT-198_tooltip: Det senare datum då det tidigare opublicerade fältet ska publiceras.

eForms.BT-799_tooltip: The type of review body (e.g. buyer; first instance review body; second instance review body; other, e.g. a civil court setting damages).
eForms.BT-137_tooltip: The identifier of a lot. In case of PINs used only for information, the identifier of a part of the notice that may later become a lot or a self-standing procedure. The information in the purpose section refers to this lot or part.
eForms.BT-1372_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. In case of PINs used only for information, the identifier of one or more parts of the notice that may later become lots or a self-standing procedures. The information in the place of performance section refers to this lot (or part) or these lots (or parts).
eForms.BT-1373_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. In case of PINs used only for information, the identifier of one or more parts of the notice that may later become lots or a self-standing procedures.  The information in the duration section refers to this lot (or part) or these lots (or parts)
eForms.BT-781_tooltip: Additional information about the duration of the contract (e.g. justification for the actual duration being different from the duration given in initial contract).
eForms.BT-1374_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. The information in the EU funds section refers to this lot or these lots.
eForms.BT-1376_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. The information in the second stage section refers to this lot or these lots.
eForms.BT-1377_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. The information in the reward and jury section refers to this lot or these lots.
eForms.BT-67b_tooltip: The brief description of criteria regarding the personal situation of tenderers that may lead to their exclusion. This shall include a list of all such criteria and indicate required information (e.g. self-declaration, documentation). This may also include specific national exclusion grounds.
eForms.BT-1378_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. The information in the selection criteria section refers to this lot or these lots.
eForms.BT-1379_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. In case of PINs used only for information, the identifier of one or more parts of the notice that may later become lots or a self-standing procedures. The information in the other requirements section refer this lot (or part) or these lots (or parts).
eForms.BT-13717_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. In case of PINs used only for information, the identifier of one or more parts of the notice that may later become lots or a self-standing procedures. The information in the contract terms section refer this lot (or part) or these lots (or parts).
eForms.BT-13710_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots or one or more groups of lots. The information in the award criteria section refers to this lot, these lots, this group, or these groups.
eForms.BT-13711_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. In case of PINs used only for information, the identifier of one or more parts of the notice that may later become lots or a self-standing procedures.  The information in the techniques section refers to this lot (or part) or these lots (or parts).
eForms.BT-13712_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. In case of PINs used only for information, the identifier of one or more parts of the notice that may later become lots or a self-standing procedures.  The information in the communication section refers to this lot (or part) or these lots (or parts).
eForms.BT-13718_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. In case of PINs used only for information, the identifier of one or more parts of the notice that may later become lots or a self-standing procedures.  The information in the procurement documents section refers to this lot (or part) or these lots (or parts).
eForms.BT-13719_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. The information in the submission terms section refers to this lot or these lots.
eForms.BT-800_tooltip: The time limit for receipt of answers to the preliminary market consultation.
eForms.BT-13713_tooltip: An identifier of a lot. The information in the procedure lot result section refers to this lot.
eForms.BT-13714_tooltip: An identifier of a lot or a group of lots for which the tender was submitted. The information in the tender section refers to this lot.
eForms.BT-779_tooltip: The value of all payments executed for the tender or another result, including options and renewals.
eForms.BT-780_tooltip: Additional information about the value of all payment executed for the tender or another result, including options and renewals (e.g. justification for the actual value being different from the value given in the initial contract).
eForms.BT-782_tooltip: The value of all penalties paid by the winner as a result of late or insufficient implementation of the tender or another result.
eForms.BT-13722_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. In case of PINs used only for information, the identifier of one or more parts of the notice that may later become lots or a self-standing procedures. The information in the additional information section refer this lot (or part) or these lots (or parts).
eForms.BT-13715_tooltip: An identifier of one or more lots. In case of PINs used only for information, the identifier of one or more parts of the notice that may later become lots or a self-standing procedures. The information in the additional information section refer this lot (or part) or these lots (or parts).
eForms.BT-1501_tooltip: An identifier of one or more sections within a previous notice within the procedure. The information in the modification section refers to this section or these sections.
eForms.BT-157_tooltip: The maximum value which may be spent in a framework agreement within a group of lots. This information can be provided when the maximum value of a group of lots is lower than the sum of maximum values of individual lots in this group (e.g. when the same budget is shared for several lots).  Maximum value means a value covering all contracts to be awarded within a framework agreement over its whole duration, including options and renewals.
eForms.BT-165_tooltip: The size of the winner, tenderer or subcontractor (e.g. micro enterprise, small enterprise, medium enterprise).
eForms.BT-724_tooltip: Electronic communication requires the use of tools and devices that are not generally available.
eForms.BT-124_tooltip: Electronic communication requires the use of tools and devices that are not generally available. The uniform resource locator (e.g. the web address) which gives unrestricted and full direct access to these tools and devices.
eForms.BT-17_tooltip: Whether economic operators are required, allowed, or not allowed to submit tenders, requests to participate, or expressions of interest electronically.
eForms.BT-19_tooltip: The justification for electronic submission of tenders, requests to participate, or expressions of interest not being possible.
eForms.BT-745_tooltip: The description of how to submit tenders, requests to participate, or expressions of interest non-electronically.
eForms.BT-18_tooltip: The internet address for submission of tenders, requests to participate, or expressions of interest by electronic means. The address shall be as direct as possible (ideally a dedicated address for the electronic submission, not just a general website).
eForms.BT-97_tooltip: A language in which tenders, requests to participate, or expressions of interest may be submitted.
eForms.BT-06_tooltip: The procurement procedure aims at reducing the environmental impacts of the procurement, fulfilling social objectives and/or buying an innovative work, supply or service.
eForms.BT-777_tooltip: Description of how the procurement procedure is aiming at reducing the environmental impacts of the procurement, fulfilling social objectives and/or buying an innovative work, supply or service.
eForms.BT-774_tooltip: A process to procure goods, services and works with reduced environmental impact throughout their life cycle.
eForms.BT-775_tooltip: A social objective promoted by the works, supplies or services (e.g. fair working conditions).
eForms.BT-776_tooltip: An indication that innovative works, supplies or services are being bought.
eForms.BT-754_tooltip: The use of accessibility criteria for persons with disabilities in the technical specifications.
eForms.BT-755_tooltip: The justification for not including accessibility criteria even though the procurement is intended for use by natural persons.
eForms.BT-717_tooltip: The procurement falls within the scope of the European Parliament and Council 2009/33/EC (Clean Vehicles Directive – CVD).
eForms.BT-735_tooltip: The CVD legal basis to establish which category of contract types (purchase, lease, rent, hired-purchase, public service contracts and service contracts according to table 1 CVD) applies.
eForms.BT-723_tooltip: The category of vehicle falling within the scope of Directive 2009/33/EC, including: Light-duty vehicles (M1, M2, N1); Bus (M3); Truck (N2, N3); M1; M2; N1; N2; N3.
eForms.BT-715_tooltip: The number of all vehicles (regardless of whether clean or not) falling within the scope of Directive 2009/33/EC. These vehicles have either been purchased, leased, rented, hired-purchased or their use has been contractually committed to for the provision of a purchased service falling within the scope of the Directive 2009/33/EC.
eForms.BT-725_tooltip: The number of zero-emission heavy-duty vehicles as defined by and falling within the scope of Directive 2009/33/EC. These vehicles have either been purchased, leased, rented, hired-purchased or their use has been contractually committed to for the provision of a purchased service falling within the scope of Directive 2009/33/EC.
eForms.BT-716_tooltip: The number of clean vehicles as defined by and falling within the scope of Directive 2009/33/EC. These vehicles have either been purchased, leased, rented, hired-purchased, or their use has been contractually committed to for the provision of a purchased service falling within the scope of Directive 2009/33/EC.
eForms.BT-726_tooltip: The buyer emphasizes that this procurement is also suitable for small and medium enterprises (SMEs).
eForms.BT-747_tooltip: The criteria (or criterion) concern(s), for example, economic and financial standing or technical and professional ability.
eForms.BT-748_tooltip: The criteria (or criterion) of the given type are (is) used, unused, or (in case of prior information notice used as a call for competition or to reduce time limits) the use is not yet known.
eForms.BT-749_tooltip: The name of the selection criteria (or criterion).
eForms.BT-750_tooltip: The brief description of the selection criteria (or criterion), including minimum requirements, required information (e.g. self-declaration, documentation) and how the criteria or criterion will be used to select candidates to be invited for the second stage of the procedure (if a maximum number of candidates was set).
eForms.BT-40_tooltip: The criteria (or criterion) will (only) be used to select the candidates to be invited for the second stage of the procedure (if a maximum number of candidates was set).
eForms.BT-752_official: Selection Criteria Second Stage Invite Number
eForms.BT-752: Selection Criteria Second Stage Invite Number
eForms.BT-752_tooltip: A number linked to the selection criteria (or criterion).
eForms.BT-7531_official: Selection Criteria Second Stage Invite Number Weight
eForms.BT-7531: Selection Criteria Second Stage Invite Number Weight
eForms.BT-7531_tooltip: Whether the number linked to a selection criterion (or selection criteria) is a type of weight (e.g. a percentage).
eForms.BT-7532_official: Selection Criteria Second Stage Invite Number Threshold
eForms.BT-7532: Selection Criteria Second Stage Invite Number Threshold
eForms.BT-7532_tooltip: Whether the number linked to a selection criterion (or selection criteria) is a type of threshold (e.g. a minimum score, a maximum number of tenders with the highest score passing).
eForms.BT-536_tooltip: The (estimated) date when the contract, framework agreement, dynamic purchasing system or qualification system will start.
eForms.BT-36_tooltip: The (estimated) period from the start to the end of the contract, framework agreement, dynamic purchasing system or qualification system. This shall include any options and renewals.
eForms.BT-537_tooltip: The (estimated) date when the contract, framework agreement, dynamic purchasing system or qualification system will finish.
eForms.BT-538_tooltip: The duration is unknown, unlimited, etc.
eForms.BT-58_tooltip: The maximum number of times the contract can be renewed. By renewing, the buyer reserves the right (i.e. not an obligation) to renew the contract (i.e. extend its duration) without a new procurement procedure. For example, a contract may be valid for one year and the buyer may keep a possibility to renew it (e.g. once, twice) for another three months, if he is content with the services he received.
eForms.BT-57_tooltip: Any other information about the renewal(s).
eForms.BT-71_tooltip: Whether participation is reserved for specific organisations (e.g. sheltered workshops, organisations pursuing a public service mission).
eForms.BT-79_tooltip: Whether the names and professional qualifications of the staff assigned to perform the contract must be given.
eForms.BT-736_tooltip: Whether the execution of the contract must be performed in the framework of sheltered employment programmes.
eForms.BT-761_tooltip: A certain legal form must be taken by a group of tenderers that is awarded a contract.
eForms.BT-76_tooltip: The legal form that must be taken by a group of tenderers that is awarded a contract.
eForms.BT-70_tooltip: The main information about the performance of the contract (e.g. intermediary deliverables, compensation for damages, intellectual property rights).
eForms.BT-77_tooltip: The main information about financing and payment and/or reference to any provisions that govern them.
eForms.BT-743_tooltip: Whether the buyer will require, allow or not allow electronic invoices.
eForms.BT-65_tooltip: An obligation to be met by the tenderer concerning subcontracting.
eForms.BT-64_tooltip: The minimum percentage of the contract value that the contractor must subcontract using the competitive procedure described in Title III of European Parliament and Council Directive 2009/81/EC.
eForms.BT-729_tooltip: The maximum percentage of the contract value that the contractor must subcontract using the competitive procedure described in Title III of Directive 2009/81/EC.
eForms.BT-765_tooltip: Whether a framework agreement with, without, or with and without the reopening of competition is involved.
eForms.BT-778_tooltip: There is a maximum number of participants in the framework agreement.
eForms.BT-113_tooltip: The maximum number of participants in the framework agreement.
eForms.BT-109_tooltip: The justification for exceptional cases when the duration of framework agreements exceeds the legal limits.
eForms.BT-766_tooltip: Whether a dynamic purchasing system is involved and, in case of central purchasing bodies, whether it may be used by buyers not listed in this notice.
eForms.BT-75_tooltip: The description of the financial guarantee required from the tenderer when submitting a tender. The guarantee can take the form of, for example, a payment to the buyer or a document from a bank. Typically, the guarantee would be forfeit when a tenderer has won the contract but then refused to sign it.
eForms.BT-651_tooltip: The information about subcontracting that must be indicated in the tender.
eForms.BT-161_tooltip: The value of all contracts awarded in this notice, including options and renewals.
eForms.BT-118_tooltip: The maximum value which can be spent within the framework agreement(s) announced in this notice over its/their whole duration, in all lots, including options and renewals, as calculated on the basis of the winner’s tender or winners’ tenders.
eForms.BT-1118_tooltip: The approximate value to be spent within the framework agreement(s) announced in this notice over its/their whole duration, in all lots, including options and renewals, as calculated on the basis of the winner’s tender or winners’ tenders.
eForms.BT-556_official: Group Framework Maximum Value Lot Identifier
eForms.BT-556: Group Framework Maximum Value Lot Identifier
eForms.BT-556_tooltip: An identifier of a lot within the procedure that is part of a group of lots whose maximum value is lower than the sum of maximum values of individual lots (e.g. when the same budget is shared for several lots). These are maximum values as calculated on the basis of the winner’s tender or winners’ tenders.
eForms.BT-156_tooltip: It is the re-calculated maximum value likely to be spent for a group of lots within the procedure. This information can be provided when the maximum value of a group of lots is lower than the sum of values of individual lots (e.g. when the same budget is shared for several lots). The value covers all contracts to be awarded within a framework agreement over its whole duration, including options and renewals. The value is re-calculated on the basis of the winner’s tender or winners’ tenders.
eForms.BT-144_tooltip: The reason for not choosing a winner.
eForms.BT-162_tooltip: The estimated revenue coming from the users of the concession (e.g. fees and fines).
eForms.BT-160_tooltip: The estimated revenue coming from the buyer who granted the concession (e.g. prizes and payments).
eForms.BT-163_tooltip: The description of the method used for calculating the estimated value of the concession and any other relevant information concerning the value of the concession.
eForms.BT-50_tooltip: The minimum number of candidates to be invited for the second stage of the procedure.
eForms.BT-661_tooltip: There is a maximum number of candidates to be invited for the second stage of the procedure.
eForms.BT-51_tooltip: The maximum number of candidates to be invited for the second stage of the procedure.
eForms.BT-52_tooltip: The procedure will take place in successive stages. In each stage, some participants may be eliminated.
eForms.BT-644_tooltip: The value of the prize, if any, for the winner of a design contest, innovation partnership or competitive dialogue
eForms.BT-44_tooltip: The place (e.g. first place, second place) in a design contest, innovation partnership or competitive dialogue that receives the prize.
eForms.BT-41_tooltip: Any service contract following the contest will be awarded to one of the winners of the contest.
eForms.BT-45_tooltip: Further information about follow-up contracts, prizes and payments (for example non-monetary prizes, payments given for participation).
eForms.BT-42_tooltip: The decision of the jury is binding on the buyer.
eForms.BT-47_tooltip: A name of an already selected participant. A participant could have been selected already at the time of the publication of the design contest notice because, for example, the information about the participation of a world-renowned architect is intended to promote the contest amongst other potential participants.
eForms.BT-539_tooltip: Whether the criterion concerns the price, the cost, or a non-price non-cost attribute of the tender. (Price is the acquisition price; cost is any other non-price monetary criterion.)
eForms.BT-734_tooltip: The name of the award criterion.
eForms.BT-540_tooltip: The description of the award criterion.
eForms.BT-541_tooltip: A number linked to an award criterion.
eForms.BT-5421_tooltip: Whether the number linked to an award criterion is a type of weight (e.g. a percentage).
eForms.BT-5422_tooltip: Whether the number linked to an award criterion is a fixed value (e.g. a fixed price, a fixed cost).
eForms.BT-5423_tooltip: Whether the number linked to an award criterion is a type of threshold (e.g. a minimum score, a maximum number of tenders with the highest score passing).
eForms.BT-543_tooltip: The mathematical equation or any other description used for complicated weighing of criteria (e.g. non-linear weighing, the analytic hierarchy process) when a weighing cannot be expressed per criterion.
eForms.BT-733_tooltip: The justification for only indicating the award criteria's order of importance, not their weighing.
eForms.BT-500_tooltip: The official name of the organisation.
eForms.BT-510_tooltip: The name of the street, road, avenue, etc., of the organisation's physical address and further identification (e.g. building number).
eForms.BT-513_tooltip: The name of the locality (city, town, or village) of the organisation's physical address.
eForms.BT-512_tooltip: The post code of the organisation's physical address.
eForms.BT-507_tooltip: The location according to the common classification of territorial units for statistics (NUTS) of the organisation's physical address. The NUTS3 classification code shall be used.
eForms.BT-514_tooltip: The country of the organisation's physical address.
eForms.BT-502_tooltip: The name of the department or other contact point for communicating with the organisation. To avoid unnecessary processing of personal data, the contact point shall allow the identification of a physical person only when necessary (in the sense of European Parliament and Council Regulation (EU) 2016/679 and European Parliament and Council Regulation (EU) 2018/1725).
eForms.BT-506_tooltip: The email address for contacting the organisation. To avoid unnecessary processing of personal data, the email address shall allow the identification of a physical person only when necessary (in the sense of the Regulation (EU) 2016/679 and Regulation (EU) 2018/1725).
eForms.BT-503_tooltip: The telephone number for contacting the organisation. To avoid unnecessary processing of personal data, the telephone number shall allow the identification of a physical person only when necessary (in the sense of the Regulation (EU) 2016/679 and Regulation (EU) 2018/1725).
eForms.BT-11_tooltip: The type of buyer according to procurement legislation (e.g. central government authority, body governed by public law, public undertaking).
eForms.BT-740_tooltip: The buyer is a contracting entity.
eForms.BT-10_tooltip: The main activity of the contracting authority.
eForms.BT-610_tooltip: The main activity of the contracting entity.
eForms.BT-78_tooltip: The time limit by which tenderers who do not hold a security clearance may obtain it.
eForms.BT-732_tooltip: Additional information about the security clearance (e.g. which level of security clearance is required, which team members must have it, whether it is necessary already for accessing the procurement documents or only for contract execution).
eForms.BT-127_tooltip: The estimated date of publication of a contract notice within this procedure.
eForms.BT-631_tooltip: The estimated date of dispatch of the invitations to confirm interest.
eForms.BT-130_tooltip: The estimated date of dispatch of the invitations to submit tenders in two (or more) stage procedures.
eForms.BT-13_tooltip: The time limit for requesting additional information about the procurement procedure.
eForms.BT-630_tooltip: The time limit for receipt of expressions of interest.
eForms.BT-1311_tooltip: The time limit for receipt of requests to participate.
eForms.BT-131_tooltip: The time limit for receipt of tenders.
eForms.BT-98_tooltip: The period, from the tender submission deadline, for which tenders must remain valid.
eForms.BT-132_tooltip: The date and time for the public opening of tenders.
eForms.BT-133_tooltip: The place (e.g. physical address, URL) where the tenders will be publicly opened.
eForms.BT-99_tooltip: The description of the time limits for review procedures.
eForms.BT-769_tooltip: Tenderers may submit more than one tender (for a given lot).
eForms.BT-802_tooltip: Additional information about the non-disclosure agreement.
eForms.BT-123_tooltip: The internet address of the electronic auction.
eForms.BT-122_tooltip: Any additional information about the electronic auction.
eForms.BT-764_tooltip: Whether it is required, allowed or not allowed to submit (parts of) tenders as electronic catalogues.
eForms.BT-63_tooltip: Whether tenderers are required, allowed, or not allowed to submit tenders which fulfil the buyer's needs differently than as proposed in the procurement documents. Further conditions for submitting variant tenders are in the procurement documents.
eForms.BT-115_tooltip: The procurement is covered by the Government Procurement Agreement (GPA).
eForms.BT-634_tooltip: This cancelled or unsuccessful procedure or lot will be relaunched.
eForms.BT-300_tooltip: Any further information not mentioned in other sections of the notice.
eForms.BT-09_tooltip: The applicable law when buyers from different countries procure together within one procurement procedure.
eForms.BT-501_tooltip: An identifier of the organisation. All of the organisation's identifiers shall be given.
eForms.BT-16_tooltip: The name of a part of an organisation (e.g. the relevant department of a large buyer).
eForms.BT-04_tooltip: The European Public Procurement Procedure Identifier, a unique identifier of a procurement procedure. Including this identifier in all published versions of this notice (e.g. published on TED, national publication portals, regional publication portals) allows unique identification of procurement procedures around the Union.
eForms.BT-701_tooltip: The European Public Procurement Notice Identifier of this notice. Including this identifier in all published version of this notice (e.g. TED, national publication portals, regional publication portals) allows unique identification of procurement notices around the Union.
eForms.BT-757_tooltip: The version of the notice. This helps, for example, to keep track of versions of notices or changes to notices before publication.
eForms.BT-05_tooltip: The date and time when the notice has been sent for publication by the buyer.
eForms.BT-803_tooltip: The date and time the notice was transmitted electronically by the eSender to the Publications Office of the European Union
eForms.BT-1251_tooltip: The identifier of a part of a prior information notice or another similar notice related to this notice.
eForms.BT-702_tooltip: The language(s) in which this notice is officially available. These linguistic versions are equally legally valid.
eForms.BT-125_tooltip: The identifier of a prior information notice or another similar notice related to this notice.
eForms.BT-31_tooltip: The maximum number of lots for which one tenderer can submit tenders.
eForms.BT-763_tooltip: The tenderer must submit tenders for all lots.
eForms.BT-33_tooltip: The maximum number of lots for which contract(s) can be awarded to one tenderer.
eForms.BT-08_tooltip: The role of the organisation in the procurement procedure (e.g. buyer, winner). A notice shall contain all organisations in the procedure that have the role of a buyer, a winner, a review body, a buyer acquiring supplies and/or services intended for other buyers, a buyer awarding public contracts or concluding framework agreements for works, supplies or services intended for other buyers.
eForms.BT-770_tooltip: The sub-role of the organisation in the procurement procedure (e.g. group leader, organisation providing additional information about the procurement procedure).
eForms.BT-23-Procedure_tooltip: The main nature (e.g. works) of what is being bought. In case of mixed procurement (e.g. a procedure for both works and services), the main nature may be, for example, the one with the highest estimated value. This information shall be given for the whole procedure.
eForms.BT-531-Procedure_tooltip: The nature (e.g. services) of what is being bought, additional to Main Nature.
eForms.BT-01_tooltip: The legal basis (e.g. a Union or national legal act) under which the procurement procedure takes place or, in case of prior information notices, under which the procurement procedure(s) will take place.
eForms.BT-94_tooltip: Procurement whose purpose is likely to also be included in another procedure in the foreseeable future. (For example, a regularly re-tendered municipal service. This does not include awarding multiple contracts within a single qualification system, framework agreement, or a dynamic purchasing system.)
eForms.BT-95_tooltip: Any additional information about recurrence (e.g. estimated timing).
eForms.BT-105_tooltip: The type of procurement procedure (e.g. according to the types given in the Public Procurement Directives mentioned in the recitals of this Act).
eForms.BT-88_tooltip: The main features of the procedure (e.g. description of the individual stage(s)) and information about where the full rules for the procedure can be found. This information shall be given when the procedure is not one of those mentioned in the procurement Directives. This can be the case for example for concessions, for social and other specific services, and in case of voluntary publication of procurement procedures below the EU procurement thresholds.
eForms.BT-106_tooltip: The time limit for receipt of requests to participate or of tenders in this procedure can be reduced due to a state of urgency.
eForms.BT-1351_tooltip: The justification for using an accelerated procedure.
eForms.BT-136_tooltip: A justification for using a procedure which allows directly awarding contracts, i.e. a procedure that does not require publishing a call for competition in the Official Journal of the European Union.
eForms.BT-1252_official: Direct Award Justification Previous Procedure Identifier
eForms.BT-1252: Direct Award Justification Previous Procedure Identifier
eForms.BT-1252_tooltip: An identifier of a previous procedure that justifies the use of a procedure which allows directly awarding contracts, i.e. justifying a procedure that does not require publishing a call for competition in the Official Journal of the European Union.
eForms.BT-135_tooltip: The justification for using a procedure which allows directly awarding contracts, i.e. a procedure that does not require publishing a call for competition in the Official Journal of the European Union.
eForms.BT-53_tooltip: The buyer reserves the right (not an obligation) for additional purchases from the contractor (while the contract is valid).
eForms.BT-5101_tooltip: The name of the street, road, avenue, etc., of the place of performance and further identification (e.g. building number).
eForms.BT-5131_tooltip: The name of the locality (city, town, or village) of the place of performance.
eForms.BT-5121_tooltip: The postcode of the place of performance.
eForms.BT-5071_tooltip: The location according to the common classification of territorial units for statistics (NUTS). The NUTS3 classification code shall be used.
eForms.BT-5141_tooltip: The country of the place of performance.
eForms.BT-727_tooltip: There are other restrictions on the place of performance (e.g. "anywhere in the European Economic Area", "anywhere in the given country").
eForms.BT-728_tooltip: Additional information about the place of performance.
eForms.BT-60_tooltip: The procurement is at least partially financed by Union funds such as the European Structural and Investment Funds or grants awarded by the Union.
eForms.BT-7220_tooltip: The programme of the Union funds used to at least partially finance the contract.
eForms.BT-5010_tooltip: An identifier of the Union programme used to at least partially finance the contract. The most concrete information must be given (e.g. grant agreement number, national identifier, project acronym, contract number).
eForms.BT-6140_tooltip: Further information about the Union programme or project used at least partially finance the procurement.
eForms.BT-120_tooltip: The buyer reserves the right to award the contract on the basis of the initial tenders without any further negotiations.
eForms.BT-722_tooltip: The programme of the Union funds used to at least partially finance the contract.
eForms.BT-5011_tooltip: An identifier of the Union programme used to at least partially finance the contract. The most concrete information must be given (e.g. grant agreement number, national identifier, project acronym, contract number)
eForms.BT-6110_tooltip: Further information about the Union programme or project used at least partially finance the procurement.
eForms.BT-27_tooltip: The estimated value of the procurement procedure or lot, over its whole duration, including options and renewals.
eForms.BT-24-Procedure_tooltip: The description of the nature and quantity of what is being bought or of the needs and requirements that shall be met in this procedure or lot. In case of a modification notice, the description of the procurement before and after the modification.
eForms.BT-271_tooltip: The maximum value of the framework agreement for the procurement procedure or lot, over its whole duration, including options and renewals. This value covers all contracts to be awarded within the framework agreement.
eForms.BT-26_tooltip: The type of classification describing the purchase (e.g. the CPV).
eForms.BT-262_tooltip: The code from the classification that best characterises the purchase.
eForms.BT-263_tooltip: An additional code from the classification that also characterises the purchase.
eForms.BT-15_tooltip: The internet address for accessing (the non-restricted part of) the procurement documents. For all notices except prior information notices, the address shall give access that is direct (i.e. the exact webpage with the documents, not a general website), unrestricted (e.g. no registration), full (i.e. the procurement documents are complete) and free of charge and the documents shall be available already at the time of the publication of the notice.
eForms.BT-708_tooltip: The language(s) in which the procurement documents are officially available. These linguistic versions are equally legally valid.
eForms.BT-737_tooltip: The language(s) in which the procurement documents (or their parts) are unofficially available. These linguistic versions are not an official translation, they are provided only for information.
eForms.BT-14_tooltip: The access to certain procurement documents is restricted.
eForms.BT-707_tooltip: The justification for restricting access to certain procurement documents.
eForms.BT-615_tooltip: The internet address with information on accessing the restricted (part of the) procurement documents.
eForms.BT-119_tooltip: The dynamic purchasing system is terminated. No further contracts, besides those published in this notice, will be awarded in the dynamic purchasing system. This field can be used even if no contracts are awarded in the contract award notice.
eForms.BT-709_tooltip: The maximum value which can be spent within a framework agreement over its whole duration, including options and renewals, as calculated on the basis of the winner’s tender or winners’ tenders.
eForms.BT-660_tooltip: The value likely to be spent within a framework agreement over its whole duration, including options and renewals, as re-estimated on the basis of the winner’s tender or winners’ tenders.
eForms.BT-759_tooltip: Number of tenders or requests to participate received. Tenders including variants or multiple tenders submitted (for one lot) by the same tenderer should be counted as one tender.
eForms.BT-760_tooltip: The type of tenders or requests to participate received. The total number of tenders received shall be given. When a notice does not fall under Directive 2009/81/EC and is not about social or other specific services, the number of tenders received from micro, small and medium enterprises; the number of tenders received from tenderers registered in other European Economic Area countries and the number of tenders received from tenderers registered in countries outside of the European Economic Area shall also be given. All tenders shall be counted, regardless of whether they are admissible or inadmissible. For tenders submitted by a group of tenderers (e.g. a consortium), the tender shall be counted in the relevant category (e.g. SME) if the majority of the work is expected to be done by tenderers which fall within this category (e.g. they are SMEs).
eForms.BT-710_tooltip: Value of the admissible tender with the lowest value. A tender shall be considered admissible where it has been submitted by a tenderer, who has not been excluded and who meets the selection criteria, and when it is in conformity with the technical specifications without being irregular (e.g. received late, having an abnormally low price or cost) or unacceptable or unsuitable. Only tenders for which it has been verified if they are admissible or inadmissible may be taken into account.
eForms.BT-711_tooltip: Value of the admissible tender with the highest value. A tender shall be considered admissible where it has been submitted by a tenderer, who has not been excluded and who meets the selection criteria, and when it is in conformity with the technical specifications without being irregular (e.g. received late, having an abnormally low price or cost) or unacceptable or unsuitable. Only tenders for which it has been verified if they are admissible or inadmissible may be taken into account.
eForms.BT-3201_tooltip: An identifier of a tender. The information in the tender section refers to this tender.
eForms.BT-720_tooltip: The value of the tender or another result, including options and renewals. In case of the modification notice, the value of the modification.
eForms.BT-1711_tooltip: The tender was ranked. (This is not the rank itself, but only whether the ranking took place).
eForms.BT-171_tooltip: The position of the tender (i.e. whether the tender ended up first, second, third, etc.) in a design contest, a framework agreement with multiple winners (e.g. cascades), an innovation partnership, a competitive dialogue, or another procedure.
eForms.BT-773_tooltip: Whether at least a part of the contract will be subcontracted.
eForms.BT-730_tooltip: The buyer knows at least the estimated value of the part of the contract that the contractor will subcontract to third parties.
eForms.BT-553_tooltip: The estimated value of the part of the contract that the contractor will subcontract to third parties.
eForms.BT-731_tooltip: The buyer knows at least the estimated percentage of the contract that the contractor will subcontract to third parties compared to the whole contract.
eForms.BT-555_tooltip: The estimated percentage of the contract that the contractor will subcontract to third parties compared to the whole contract.
eForms.BT-554_tooltip: The description of the part of the contract that the contractor will subcontract to third parties.
eForms.BT-1451_tooltip: The date of the official decision choosing the winning tender.
eForms.BT-145_tooltip: The date when the contract was concluded. Typically, this is the date when the last contractual party signed the contract. However, if no contract is signed, then the date of contract conclusion may correspond to other dates (e.g. the date when the buyer notified the winning tenderer). The date of contract conclusion is always later than the end of the standstill period and the moment when any evidence submitted by the winner has been verified.
eForms.BT-768_tooltip: The contract is awarded within a framework agreement.
eForms.BT-3202_tooltip: An identifier of the tender or another result that led to this contract.
eForms.BT-21_tooltip: The name of the procurement procedure or lot.
eForms.BT-22_tooltip: The internal identifier used for files regarding the procurement procedure or lot before a procedure identifier is given (e.g. coming from the buyer's document management system or procurement planning system).
eForms.BT-150_tooltip: An identifier of the contract or, in case of voluntary-ex ante transparency notices and design contest result notices, of the decision. The information in the contract section refers to this contract or decision.
eForms.BT-721_tooltip: The name of the contract or, in case of voluntary-ex ante transparency notices and design contest result notices, of the decision.
eForms.BT-141_tooltip: The description of changes in the notice compared to the original notice.
eForms.BT-719_tooltip: The date and time when the procurement documents have changed.
eForms.BT-140_tooltip: The main reason for the change in the notice compared to the original notice.
eForms.BT-762_tooltip: The description of the main reason for the change in the notice compared to the original notice.
eForms.BT-330_tooltip: The identifier of a group of lots in the procedure.
eForms.BT-1375_tooltip: An identifier of a lot within the procedure that is part of a group of lots for which one tender can be submitted and evaluated.
eForms.BT-202_tooltip: The summary of the contract modification(s).
eForms.BT-200_tooltip: The main reason for modifying the contract.
eForms.BT-201_tooltip: The description of the main reason for modifying the contract.
eForms.BT-13716_tooltip: An identifier of one or more sections within the changed notice. The information in the change section refers to this section or these sections.
eForms.BT-758_tooltip: The reference to the version of the previous notice that should be changed. This helps, for example, to keep track of versions of notices or changes to notices before publication.
eForms.BT-03_tooltip: The type of form according to procurement legislation.
eForms.BT-02_tooltip: The type of notice according to procurement legislation.
eForms.BT-738_tooltip: The preferred date of publication of the notice on TED (e.g. to avoid publication during a national holiday).
eForms.BT-739_tooltip: The fax number for contacting the organisation. To avoid unnecessary processing of personal data, the fax number shall allow the identification of a physical person only when necessary (in the sense of the Regulation (EU) 2016/679 and Regulation (EU) 2018/1725).
eForms.BT-509_tooltip: The organisation's uniform resource locator for exchange of data and documents.
eForms.BT-633_tooltip: The organisation is a natural person.
eForms.BT-508_tooltip: The website where the buyer publishes information regarding procurement procedures (e.g. notices, procurement documents).
eForms.BT-706_tooltip: The nationality (or nationalities) of the beneficiary owner(s) of the winner, tenderer, or subcontractor as published in the register(s) established by European Parliament and Council Directive (EU) 2018/843. If such a register does not exist (e.g. in case of contractors established outside the Union) then equivalent information from other sources.
eForms.BT-746_tooltip: The nationality (or nationalities) of the beneficiary owner(s) of the winner, tenderer, or subcontractor is not published in the register(s) established by Directive (EU) 2018/843, because the winner is listed on a regulated market (e.g. a stock exchange) that ensures adequate transparency in line with anti-money laundering legislation.
eForms.BT-625_tooltip: The unit which the good, service, or work comes in, for example hours or kilograms. Where the CPV code is a supply which does not need a further unit (e.g. cars), then no unit needs to be given and quantity is taken to be an amount, e.g. the "number of cars".
eForms.BT-46_tooltip: A name of the jury member.
eForms.BT-111_tooltip: Any additional categories of buyers participating in the framework agreement and not mentioned by name (e.g. "all hospitals in the Tuscany region").
eForms.BT-632_tooltip: The name of the electronic tool or device used for electronic communication.
eForms.BT-744_tooltip: Advanced or qualified electronic signature or seal (as defined in European Parliament and Council Regulation (EU) No 910/2014) is required.
eForms.BT-134_tooltip: Further information about the public opening of tenders. (For example, who may participate in the opening and whether any authorisation is needed.)
eForms.BT-771_tooltip: Whether tenderer-related information can be supplemented even after the submission deadline.
eForms.BT-772_tooltip: Description of the tenderer-related information that can be supplemented even after the submission deadline.
eForms.BT-191_tooltip: A country of origin of the product or the service.
eForms.BT-151_tooltip: The uniform resource locator (e.g. the web address) of the contract.
eForms.BT-712_tooltip: The number of organisations that requested the buyer to review any of its decisions (e.g. the technical specifications, award decision).
eForms.BT-635_tooltip: The number of requests the buyer received to review any of its decisions.
eForms.BT-636_tooltip: The type of irregularity alleged in the review requests.
eForms.BT-756_tooltip: The prior information notice used as a call for competition (or a specific lot) is terminated. No further contracts, besides those published in this notice, will be awarded following this prior information notice used as a call for competition. This field can be used even if no contracts are awarded in the contract award notice.
eForms.BT-195_tooltip: Identifier of the field that shall not be immediately published. Only fields concerning the Result value and groups of fields concerning the Tender and Procedure Lot Result can be unpublished. In the case of the European Parliament and Council Directive 2014/25/EU, the award criteria, the procurement procedure, certain dates and in certain cases information about the nature and quantity of a service can be unpublished as well.
eForms.BT-197_tooltip: The justification for not immediately publishing a field.
eForms.BT-196_tooltip: The justification for not immediately publishing a field and for the choice of a later date at which it can be published.
eForms.BT-198_tooltip: The later date at which the originally unpublished field shall be published.
